name: Ministry of Evil: The Twisted Cult of Tony Alamo

episodes.title: Series 1: Episode 4
episodes.description: Once released from prison, Tony Alamo begins 'wedding' young girls. As the child abuse escalates, former members urge the FBI to intervene.

episodes.title: Series 1: Episode 3
episodes.description: While on the run, Alamo orders his followers to leave the compound and take his wife's body whilst he tries to evade arrest.

episodes.title: Series 1: Episode 2
episodes.description: Tony and Susan Alamo's grip on power is challenged as Susan becomes ill and law enforcement investigates allegations of labour violations and abuse.

episodes.title: Series 1: Episode 1
episodes.description: In the 1960s, preachers Susan and Tony Alamo recruit vulnerable young people to join their cult promoting personal salvation. Over time, the group faces allegations of abuse.
